title: Reno Gabrini: A Family Affair
description: Vegas casino owner and gorgeous bad boy Reno Gabrini is getting hit from all sides. His youngest son is unable to control his own bad boy nature. His oldest son is unable to keep it in his pants. His beautiful African-American wife is meeting men in motel rooms and creating a chasm in their marriage that may not be able to heal. And Reno himself is racing against time to save his family, not only from themselves, but from outside forces he never saw coming. In an explosive installment of the Mob Boss interracial romance series, Reno and Trina find themselves on a collision course with a fate that blindsides both of them.
author: Mallory Monroe
